mapper.insert: insert into coupons(code, name, type, description, total_quantity, validity_type, valid_start_time, valid_end_time, days_after_claim, discount_percent, min_spend, max_discount_amount, discount_amount) values (#{code}, #{name}, #{type}, #{description}, #{totalQuantity}, #{validityType}, #{validStartTime}, #{validEndTime}, #{daysAfterClaim}, #{discountPercent}, #{minSpend}, #{maxDiscountAmount}, #{discountAmount})
